attributes.action: Cancel all current debt and set the people free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has the power to cancel all existing debt and create a new independant monetary system unique to the UK.

It is every human's right to lead a carefree and loving existence and not to be burdened with worries, this we have all been tricked into by the creation and registration of our birth certificate.

Make a difference by signing this petition and we will all be able to set oursevles free

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
